attributes.action: better regulate premium rate telephone lines or any telephone lines from which the company receiving calls gets revenuefrom the call.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many companies using premium rate lines or 08... numbers (excluding 0800) get revenue from the incoming call. In these cases there should be a maximum time, or maximum charge for the time, a caller can be in a call queue and a maximum time a caller can be on hold.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
